code.app.brickbreaker

Class Brick

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • code.app.brickbreaker.Brick
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class Brick
extends javafx.scene.Parent
    This class represents a 'brick' in the game
